info.title: TEI Lex-0 Dictionaries API for TEI Publisher
info.description: API for accessing dictionaries, entries and other parts via TEI Publisher application.

get.summary: Get version of the current API

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for a dictionary. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<TEI>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: Chapter of the dictionary containing entries. Usual a div with one leter. Use value of `@n` attribute of div or textual content of `<head>` element to identify chapter

get.description: Retrieve list of semantic categories in format required by pb-split-list

parameters.name: format

schema.description: The format to return: either `json`, `html`, or `xml`. The first ome returns a JSON record with additional information.

parameters.description: The format to return: either `json`, `html`, or `xml`. The first returns a JSON record with additional information.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query string, identifier or description

parameters.name: idno
parameters.description: Category id

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned items. If 0, all items are returned.

200.description: Semantic categories to process or display

XmlId.description: A unique and human readable id

DictionaryParts.description: Parts of the dictionary to be returned. Order of the parts in the source document is preserved.

EntryParts.description: Parts of the entry to be returned.

QueryPosition.description: The position of the text in searched query. Default is `exactly`.

OutputFormat.description: The format to return: either `html`, or `xml`. Default is `html`.

OutputFormatXmlJson.description: The format to return: either `xml`, or `json`. Default is `xml`.

OutputFormatXmlHtmlJson.description: The format to return: either `json`, `html`, or `xml`. The first ome returns a JSON record with additional information.

DictionaryIdParameter.name: id
DictionaryIdParameter.description: Identifier for a dictionary. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<TEI>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

DictionaryIdQueryParameter.name: id
DictionaryIdQueryParameter.description: Identifier for a dictionary. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<TEI>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

DictionaryIdsParameter.name: ids
DictionaryIdsParameter.description: Array of identifiers for a dictionary. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<TEI>` element.

EntryIdParameter.name: entry-id
EntryIdParameter.description: Identifier for an entry within an dictionary. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<entry>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

SenseIdParameter.name: sense-id
SenseIdParameter.description: Identifier for a sense within an dictionary's entry. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<sense>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

DivIdParameter.name: div-id
DivIdParameter.description: Identifier for a division. Value of an `@xml:id` attribute of the `<div>` element.

schema.description: A unique and human readable id

DictionaryPartsParameter.name: dictionary-parts
DictionaryPartsParameter.description: Parts of the dictionary to be returned.

schema.description: Parts of the dictionary to be returned. Order of the parts in the source document is preserved.

PositionParameter.name: position
PositionParameter.description: Position of the search string in the query

schema.description: The position of the text in searched query. Default is `exactly`.

ItemsPerPageParameter.name: per-page
ItemsPerPageParameter.description: Number of items to show on one page

ChapterParameter.name: chapter
ChapterParameter.description: Chapter of the dictionary containing entries. Usual a div with one leter. Use value of `@n` attribute of div or textual content of `<head>` element to identify chapter
